title: Project bootstrap and repo layout
body:
Create repo skeleton (rp/, bp/full/, bp/lite/, builds/, docs/, src/) and add README, CONTRIBUTING, and CODE_OF_CONDUCT.

Acceptance criteria:
- Folder layout present at repository root.
- RP and both BP manifests exist and are valid.
- README contains install and switch-to-lite instructions.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: L

title: Compatibility adapter and runtime detector
body:
Implement compatibility adapter in bp/full/scripts with stubs for storage, scheduler, event hooks, and a runtime version detector. Adapter isolates engine-specific calls.

Acceptance criteria:
- Adapter exports storage.read/write, scheduleRepeating, onPlayerInteract, showForm stubs.
- Startup logs runtime version via adapter.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Module loader and event bus
body:
Implement module registration API and EventBus with init/shutdown lifecycle hooks.

Acceptance criteria:
- Modules can register/unregister with lifecycle hooks.
- EventBus supports emit and on; unit tests for basic emit/on behavior.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Storage manager (atomic json persistence)
body:
Implement namespace storage API with atomic write, temp+rename strategy, and N backups.

Acceptance criteria:
- Read/write for players.json, claims.json, world.json works.
- Atomic write implemented and backups retained.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Command registry and help metadata
body:
Create command registration API with metadata (name, aliases, usage, help, permission) and a /help UI generator.

Acceptance criteria:
- Registry accepts command metadata and handlers.
- /help opens UI-generated command list from metadata.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Ui builder and i18n core
body:
Implement central UI builder that reads locale keys and builds list menus, confirm dialogs, and input forms.

Acceptance criteria:
- UI builder uses en_US.lang keys from RP.
- Compass main menu and a sample form are implemented.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Shared rp assets and locale stubs
body:
Add placeholder icons and en_US.lang entries used by initial UI and forms.

Acceptance criteria:
- RP contains icons referenced by initial UI.
- en_US.lang contains keys used by sample UI.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: XS

title: Player data model and persistence
body:
Define PlayerData JSON model and implement load/save on player join and leave.

Acceptance criteria:
- PlayerData persisted contains homes, balance, lastSeen.
- Modules can access and update PlayerData via storage API.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Homes module (ui-first)
body:
Implement /home, /sethome (/sh), /delhome (/dh) with ui-first behavior and aliases.

Acceptance criteria:
- /home opens list UI when no argument; selecting home teleports player.
- /sethome opens name input UI; /dh opens deletion UI.
- Homes persisted in PlayerData.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Chunk math utilities
body:
Implement helpers for chunk coordinate conversion and rectangle chunk list generation.

Acceptance criteria:
- Functions convert x,z to chunk coordinates and back.
- Unit tests validate rectangle generation and edge cases.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: XS

title: Golden shovel selection (full pack)
body:
Implement scripted golden-shovel selection: click handlers, particle outline of selected chunks, opposite-corner expansion, confirm UI, finalize claim.

Acceptance criteria:
- Selection visuals outline chunks correctly.
- Confirm UI finalizes and persists claim.
- Selection movement and cancel supported.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: XL

title: Claim management ui and commands
body:
Create UI to rename claims, share to team, add home, trust player, unclaim, and expand/shrink. Provide /claim management commands (not selection).

Acceptance criteria:
- UI supports all actions and persists changes.
- Overlap checks applied when modifying claims.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Admin claims and overlap enforcement
body:
Add admin-level claims and enforce strict non-overlap for player and admin claims.

Acceptance criteria:
- Admin claims created and flagged.
- Overlap attempts prevented with informative UI messages.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Team model and persistence
body:
Implement team data model and persistence (id, name, color, tag, description, members, settings).

Acceptance criteria:
- Teams can be created/read/updated/deleted and persist across restarts.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Faction tool ui
body:
Create faction tool UI: create (name, color, 3-char tag, description), edit, view members, and disband flows.

Acceptance criteria:
- Faction creation validated; members viewable; disband removes team and reassigns claims as configured.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Team shared claim behavior
body:
Implement team-owned claims and the shareclaims/sharemoney flags controlled by meetings or admin overrides.

Acceptance criteria:
- Team claims follow trust and build rules; sharemoney flag affects money operations when enabled.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: M

title: Economy ledger and atomic transfers
body:
Implement ledger API with add/remove/transfer operations, logging, and rate limits. Include auction escrow stub.

Acceptance criteria:
- Atomic transfer behavior validated by tests.
- Audit log entries created for econ operations.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: M

title: Shop ui and sell behavior
body:
Implement shop configuration JSON and /shop UI. /sell sells held items to shop if shop is enabled and deposits funds to bank.

Acceptance criteria:
- Shop UI lists catalog; transactions update balances and inventories.
- /sell disabled when shop is turned off by config.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: M

title: Auctionhouse ui and escrow
body:
Create auction UI to create/list/bid and implement escrow to hold items until auction end; handle payouts and transfers.

Acceptance criteria:
- Auctions persist; bids update; auction end transfers items to winner and funds to seller.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: XL

title: Tpa system and ui prompts
body:
Implement /tpa, /tpah, /tpaccept, /tpdeny with ui-first popups, timeouts, and rate limits.

Acceptance criteria:
- Requests create UI popups for targets; accept/deny flow functions and respects timeouts.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Warps and spawn management
body:
Implement /warp (/w) UI list, /setwarp, and /dw alias for deletion. Warps persist and /w without arg opens list.

Acceptance criteria:
- Warp set/delete persist; /w opens UI list.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Compass and top-level ui
body:
Give compass on first join (configurable) and make it open the top-level UI. /ui opens same menu.

Acceptance criteria:
- Compass granted on first join; interacting opens main UI; /ui works.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Meetings proposal and voting ui
body:
Implement UI to propose meetings and choose server settings/commands to be voted on. Record votes and compute quorum.

Acceptance criteria:
- Meetings persist; votes recorded; quorum logic computed and results applied or queued.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: L

title: Meeting runtime protections (full pack)
body:
Full-pack feature: teleport participants to meeting location, apply temporary invulnerability and restrict leaving the meeting area while active.

Acceptance criteria:
- Attendees teleported; damage negated for participants; leave prevented; state reverted on meeting end.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: XL

title: Phase manager and automation
body:
Implement early, mid, and end phases with mappings for worldborder, dimension locks, and loot config. Provide /phase UI and phase transition logic.

Acceptance criteria:
- Phase persisted; transitions apply configured settings; /phase UI opens and advance works per permissions/meeting rules.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: L

title: World border and dimension locks
body:
Implement chunk-aligned world border enforcement and dimension lock system for nether/end.

Acceptance criteria:
- Players prevented from leaving border; dimension locks block portal travel; admin overrides available.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: M

title: Lite claim tool (functions plan)
body:
Implement claim creation and basic management using functions/scoreboards/armor-stands for the Lite pack. Document limitations compared to full pack.

Acceptance criteria:
- Lite pack supports golden-shovel claim creation and basic editing.
- README documents functional differences and limitations.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: XL

title: Lite shop and teleport emulation
body:
Implement shop, warp, and tpa flows using item-click menus and functions for the Lite pack. Document limitations.

Acceptance criteria:
- Basic shop, warp, and tpa via functions exist; limitations documented.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: XL

title: Tests for chunk math storage and economy transfers
body:
Add unit tests for chunk math, storage atomic operations, and economy transfer logic and integrate into CI.

Acceptance criteria:
- Tests included and run in CI; all tests pass.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Developer docs and update procedure
body:
Document pack structure, how to switch to the Lite pack, update checklist, and compatibility adapter guidelines in docs/UPDATE.md.

Acceptance criteria:
- docs/UPDATE.md exists and is verified with a quick-switch test.

Milestone: MVP
Estimate: S

title: Build pipeline and packaging
body:
Create build script to generate distribution zips for RP + Full BP + Lite BP in builds/releases with manifest validation.

Acceptance criteria:
- Build artifacts produced and validated.

Milestone: Release
Estimate: M

title: Localization and string centralization
body:
Centralize all UI strings, provide full en_US coverage, and create templates for additional languages.

Acceptance criteria:
- All UI uses locale keys; README documents adding languages.

Milestone: Beta
Estimate: M
